Low.label: Low
Low.description: VHS quality RF — nostalgic but fuzzy.

Ridonkulous.label: Ridonkulous
Ridonkulous.description: "I can see the atoms in your waveform."

Quantum_Foam.label: Quantum Foam
Quantum_Foam.description: Where reality and noise floor blur.

This_is_Fine.label: This is Fine
This_is_Fine.description: The sweeper cries, but it's worth it.

Hold_Your_Horses.label: Hold Your Horses
Hold_Your_Horses.description: Just a moment — enough time to sneeze twice.

Wait-a-Second.label: Wait-a-Second
Wait-a-Second.description: Half a minute of suspense. Elevator music optional.

Microwave_Dinner.label: Microwave Dinner
Microwave_Dinner.description: One full minute — perfect for impatient people.

Coffee_Break.label: Coffee Break
Coffee_Break.description: Five minutes — time to stretch or grab caffeine.

Netflix_Warmup.label: Netflix Warmup
Netflix_Warmup.description: 30 minutes — just long enough to not commit to a show.

Full_Commitment.label: Full Commitment
Full_Commitment.description: 1 hour — a true test of patience and faith in the process.

Eternal_Watcher.label: Eternal Watcher
Eternal_Watcher.description: 3 hours — were you expecting a callback?

No_Shift.label: No Shift
No_Shift.description: don't touch that dial — stay put.

A_Wee_Bit.label: A Wee Bit
A_Wee_Bit.description: Just a nudge — like adjusting your hat slightly.

A_Nudge.label: A Nudge
A_Nudge.description: A gentle push up or down the dial.

A_Whap.label: A Whap
A_Whap.description: Noticeable thump — not subtle, not wild.

A_Scooch.label: A Scooch
A_Scooch.description: Just enough to dodge interference or hop channels.

A_Chunk.label: A Chunk
A_Chunk.description: A meaty move — shift the neighborhood.

A_Jump.label: A Jump
A_Jump.description: You're not walking anymore — you're airborne.

A_Leap.label: A Leap
A_Leap.description: Covering ground like a gazelle on caffeine.

A_Yeet.label: A Yeet
A_Yeet.description: Full send across the spectrum — no regrets.

A_Warp.label: A Warp
A_Warp.description: Fold space and reappear in another RF galaxy.

Just_a_Test.label: Just a Test
Just_a_Test.description: See how she goes — one and done.

A_Whiff.label: A Whiff
A_Whiff.description: A quick sniff around the spectrum.

A_Bunch.label: A Bunch
A_Bunch.description: Enough to get a good feel.

A_Shwack.label: A Shwack
A_Shwack.description: A hefty pile — things are serious now.

A_Tone.label: A Tone
A_Tone.description: A big, noisy tone of scans.

Never-Ending_Story.label: Never-Ending Story
Never-Ending_Story.description: Until you say stop or the program crashes spectacularly.

Crazy_Fast.label: Crazy Fast
Crazy_Fast.description: Blink and you’ll miss it. Best for wideband sweeps with minimal detail.

Very_Fast.label: Very Fast
Very_Fast.description: Great for active sweeping with basic detection.

Standard.label: Standard
Standard.description: Balanced scan — enough time for most signals to show.

Long.label: Long
Long.description: Allows time to catch short bursts or weak signals.

Very_Long.label: Very Long
Very_Long.description: Camped out. Good for quiet bands or deep listening.

Glacier_Mode.label: Glacier Mode
Glacier_Mode.description: For scientists, spies, and patient people.

Off.label: Off
Off.description: Just a raw, single sweep. Great for seeing fast changes and fleeting events, but the noise floor is high and the trace is very jittery.

Light_Filter.label: Light Filter
Light_Filter.description: A very mild smoothing of the signal, removing some of the jitter. It’s like putting a slight damper on the noise, making the trace a little easier to read.

Getting_Clear.label: Getting Clear
Getting_Clear.description: The trace becomes noticeably less fuzzy. The random spikes of the noise floor start to settle down, revealing more consistent signals.

The_Sweet_Spot.label: The Sweet Spot
The_Sweet_Spot.description: A good balance of noise reduction and display speed. The noise floor is clean, and low-level, stable signals are clearly visible.

Steady_Hands.label: Steady Hands
Steady_Hands.description: The noise floor is now very stable and appears as a thin line. You’re only seeing the most consistent signals and cutting out most of the random interference.

Deep_Dive.label: Deep Dive
Deep_Dive.description: This setting is for serious analysis. It's a highly stable trace that filters out a large portion of the ambient RF noise, allowing for precise measurements of continuous signals.

Scientific_Grade.label: Scientific Grade
Scientific_Grade.description: For when only the cleanest signal will do. This high level of averaging provides a virtually noise-free display, perfect for scientific or very low-level signal detection.

Crystal_Clear.label: Crystal Clear
Crystal_Clear.description: A deep and thorough look at the spectrum. All but the most stable signals are averaged out, offering a truly pristine view of the fundamental RF environment.

The_Observer.label: The Observer
The_Observer.description: An incredibly slow and deliberate pace. This is for long-term monitoring, allowing you to see the overall shape of the spectrum with almost all noise removed.

Meditative_Mode.label: Meditative Mode
Meditative_Mode.description: For the patient and the meticulous. This is the ultimate level of noise reduction, yielding an exceptionally smooth and stable trace for the most demanding analysis.
